name: Sasso
description: A calculator-based puzzle game. Eliminate adjacent identical digits. Challenge yourself in Endless mode.

features.description: Create adjacent identical digits to eliminate them. Master arithmetic for chain reactions.

features.description: Base×Chain×Prep×Risk scoring. Strategic play for high scores.
